thread.section_title: LEAF Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LEAF | www.leafnow.com
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: My LEAF representative, Kristine Rivera, has repeatedly provided quick, easy, and reasonably priced financing for business equipment that seriously improved my office productivity and did not take up lots of time in bank level documentation. LEAF is a company where, once you establish your good name, they are there for you. LEAF should not be your last call. It should be your first call.
